casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marion BEASLEY, Jr. 504P04-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Marion Beasley, Sr., Maury, For Beasley, Marion (Sr.) Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of April 2019 by Defendant for Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
